quest.name: The Bathing Bully
journal: Mogret is in desperate need of a bath.
A popular moogle bathing spot has been taken over by half-fish, half-dragon monstrosities called hropkens. Slay three of them, scattering the beasts so Mogret can finally clean under her wings.
You have slain the hropkens, although their odor still remains fresh in your nose. Return to Mogret and inform her that the waters are once again safe.
Mogret is overjoyed at your news, and explains that she can't stand the smell of raw fish. She suggests that maybe you should also consider taking a dip in the waters.

dialogue.name: MOGRET
dialogue.text: Have you ever bathed in the waters to the northeast? Of course not, because a gang of burly hropkens has been attacking any who goes near them, kupo! If you were kind enough to slay a few, that might scare them away, giving me time for a dip in the waters.

dialogue.name: MOGRET
dialogue.text: Surely half-dragon, half-fish beasts don't need those waters like I do. Scare them away so I can finally get myself clean.

dialogue.name: MOGRET
dialogue.text: Many thanks, brave adventurer! Finally I can enjoy a bath without the smell of raw dragon-fish assaulting my senses. <sniff> ...Say, a dip in the waters might serve to, uh...freshen you up as well, kupo!
